channel.title: CVE Feed for Symantec Corporation -- SSL Visibility
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Symantec Corporation -- SSL Visibility

item.title: CVE-2016-10259|2024-09-17T01:45:40.309Z -- symantec%20corporation -- ssl%20visibility
item.description: Symantec SSL Visibility (SSLV) 3.8.4FC, 3.9, 3.10 before 3.10.4.1, and 3.11 before 3.11.3.1 is susceptible to a denial-of-service vulnerability that impacts the SSL servers for intercepted SSL connections. A malicious SSL client can, under certain circumstances, temporarily exhaust the TCP connection pool of an SSL server.
